pageContext.claim: “Then you hear it's 17 agencies. Well, it's three.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump uses a rhetorical trick of trying to undermine the results of the Russia assessment by saying it was just three or four agencies, not all 17 intelligence agencies. The report was jointly issued by the Central Intelligence Agency, National Security Agency, Federal Bureau of Investigation and Director of National Intelligence. The DNI is an umbrella organization that oversees all 17 intelligence agencies.
